long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Curate Your Personal Newsletter with Webcaptur üíå

Tired of information overload? Webcaptur makes it simple to receive a custom newsletter of the articles and pages you find most interesting. As you browse, capture content effortlessly with a single click. Each day, we compile your selection into a beautiful, curated newsletter sent straight to your inbox!

‚úÖ Features:

- 1-Click Page Capture: Easily add any content to your daily digest with a single click.
- Daily Newsletter Creation: Every day, receive a beautifully formatted summary of the articles and content you picked.
- Intelligent Summaries: Webcaptur summarizes content into concise highlights, so your newsletter is packed with insights.
- Curate Your Content: Choose only what interests you throughout the day ‚Äì the newsletter is as unique as your picks.
- Translations: Enjoy built-in translation to 6 languages (more to come!) for multilingual newsletters.
- Archive: Search and access all your past newsletters in your Account.

üñ•Ô∏è How It Works:

1. One Click Article Curation: Curate your newsletter effortlessly throughout the day with just one click using our Chrome browser extension.
2. Concise (and Precise) Summaries: We transform your saved pages into a sleek and engaging newsletter, summarizing the key points so you can catch up on what matters most.
3. Bespoke Newsletters: Choose your preferred delivery time (morning or evening) and receive your curated newsletter daily, right in your inbox.
4. Save Time, Stay Informed: Our users report saving up to 24 minutes per day with Webcaptur, making it easier than ever to stay updated without the time commitment.

üöÄ Getting Started:

- Install the extension
- Click the Webcaptur icon to create your account (and activate your free trial)
- In your account settings, select your preferences
- Start picking articles with one click
- Enjoy your first newsletter!

‚ö° Performance:

- Lightweight extension (<100kb zipped)
- No impact on browser performance

üîí Your Privacy Matters

- Zero background tracking or automatic collection
- We only capture page content when you click "Add this page to the next edition"
- You're always in control of what data is shared
- More informations in our Privacy Policy (https://webcaptur.com/privacy-policy)

üíå Why Webcaptur? Stay in control of your daily reading and make the most of your online discoveries. Curate, summarize, and enjoy a tailored newsletter that‚Äôs just right for you.

üí∏ Webcaptur is a subscription-based service. We offer a free 7-day trial with no credit-card required and no limitations. Get started today: https://webcaptur.com/pricing

‚ùì Have questions? You will probably find an answer in our Frequently asked questions: https://webcaptur.com/#faq

üêû Need support, want to report a bug, or have a feature request? Contact us at https://webcaptur.com/contact ‚Äì we're here to help!

Try Webcaptur today and transform how you consume online content! üíå
